name: Speed up Contact Form 7
author: Hella fast

sections.description:
Makes Contact Form 7, reCaptcha and add-ons to load only if there’s a shortcode. Decreases number of unused CSS and JavaScript, makes PageSpeed a little happier.

Need help with website speed optimization? Visit hellafast.digital/speed-optimization-service, we have been doing it for years.

Updates

Version 1.1 adds support for Redirection for Contact Form 7 add-on
sections.installation: Just install the plugin. That’s it. It has been tested on dozens of clients’ website, but we recommend to check if your contact forms work just in case ðŸ™‚

short_description: Makes Contact Form 7 and several add-ons to load only on pages with a form. Increases PageSpeed and improves load time.
